H0.text: Ninette de Valois was involved professionally in what activity. Opera

H1.text: Ninette de Valois was involved professionally in what activity. Theater

H2.text: Ninette de Valois was involved professionally in what activity. Music

H3.text: Ninette de Valois was involved professionally in what activity. Balet

A4.text: She was appointed principal dancer of the Beecham Opera, which was then the resident opera company at the Royal Opera House.

A5.text: She established the Royal Ballet, one of the foremost ballet companies of the 20th century and one of the leading ballet companies in the world.

A6.text: Ninette de Valois founded the Academy of Choreographic Art in 1926, a dance school for girls.

A7.text: Ninette de Valois collaborated with Lilian Baylis to stage performances at the Old Vic and Sadler's Wells theatres.
